execution_plan.description: Sum total revenue (EUR) for the current quarter from the EU orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s1__revenue FROM orders WHERE date_trunc('quarter', orders.updated_at) = date_trunc('quarter', CURRENT_DATE);

execution_plan.description: Sum total revenue (EUR) for the current quarter from the US orders table.
execution_plan.query: SELECT SUM(orders.total_eur) AS s2__revenue FROM orders WHERE date_trunc('quarter', orders.updated_at) = date_trunc('quarter', CURRENT_DATE);
